deepLinks.name: Commitment to Clean
deepLinks.snippet: At Marriott, food handlers and supervisors are trained on safe food preparation and service practices. The company's food and beverage operations are required to conduct self-inspection using its food safety standards as guidelines, and compliance is validated by independent audits. Marriott is also enhancing sanitation guidelines and training ...

deepLinks.name: Marriott Bonvoy APP
deepLinks.snippet: Both the app and Marriott.com link into the same booking engine, so there is virtually no difference between the two. Beyond booking a stay, the Marriott Bonvoy App gives you access to our suite of Mobile Guest Services—Mobile Check-In, Mobile Key, Mobile Chat and Requests, and Mobile Dining—all from the palm of your hand, throughout your entire trip.

deepLinks.name: Downtown Atlanta Hotel Suites
deepLinks.snippet: Atlanta Marriott Marquis offers over 1,600 renovated hotel rooms near the aquarium in Atlanta. Take in fantastic views of the skyline, catch up on your shows thanks to steaming service connectivity and get a good night's sleep on comfortable plush bedding.

value.name: Atlanta Marriott Marquis, Atlanta – Updated 2023 Prices - Booking.com
value.snippet: Atlanta Marriott Marquis rooms include a flat-screen cable TV, coffee-making facilities, and work desk. Rooms feature floor-to-ceiling windows as well. An indoor/outdoor pool and business center are available to guests for added convenience. High Velocity Restaurant and Bar is a casual eatery that serves in pub fare for lunch on weekends and dinner.

value.name: Atlanta Marriott Marquis - Wikipedia
value.snippet: One of the defining features of the Marriott Marquis is its large atrium. It was the largest in the world upon its completion in 1985, at 470 feet (143 m) high. The atrium spans the entire height of the building and consists of two vertical chambers divided by elevator shafts and bridges. The record was later broken by the Burj Al Arab in Dubai.

value.name: Welcome to the Atlanta Marriott Marquis
value.description: Welcome to the newly renovated Atlanta Marriott Marquis hotel. Almost 160,000 square feet of revitalized space. 1,663 new, state-of-the-art guest rooms (including 94 spacious suites). Beautiful spa & 24-hour fitness center. Unique dining options. All 15 minutes from the Hartsfield-Jackson International Airport. Your journey beings here.
